abilities.name: ***Multiattack.***
abilities.ability: The Acklay has six legs and is incredibly fast. It attacks twice with its Claws and once with its Bite.

actions.name: ***Claws.***
actions.action: *Melee Weapon Attack:* +5 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. *Hit* 9 piercing (1d8 + 4)

actions.name: ***Bite.***
actions.action: *Melee Weapon Attack:* +5 to hit, one target. *Hit* 10 piercing (1d10 + 4)
